hero.title: TRANSFORM YOUR CREATIVE WORKFLOW
hero.subtitle: Transform your creative production workflow with ATLVS and OPENDECK. Enterprise-grade project management, asset organization, and team collaboration tools designed for modern creative teams.

products.title: TWO PLATFORMS, INFINITE POSSIBILITIES
products.subtitle: ATLVS and OPENDECK work together to provide the most comprehensive solution for creative production management and talent acquisition in the industry.

atlvs.name: ATLVS
atlvs.description: Complete enterprise production management suite with AI-powered insights, real-time collaboration, and comprehensive project oversight.

opendeck.name: OPENDECK
opendeck.description: Connect with top talent, discover resources, and access a comprehensive marketplace designed for creative professionals and enterprises.

integration.title: BETTER TOGETHER
integration.description: When used together, ATLVS and OPENDECK create a unified ecosystem where project management meets talent acquisition, enabling unprecedented efficiency and collaboration.

pricing.title: PLANS THAT GROW WITH YOU
pricing.subtitle: Start your free 14-day trial, no credit card required. Choose the perfect plan for your team and scale as you grow.

toggle.savings: Save up to 17% with annual billing

support.name: Premium Support
support.description: Dedicated support when you need it most

questions.question: What's included in the free trial?
questions.answer: All plans include a 14-day free trial with full access to features. No credit card required to start.

questions.question: Can I change plans at any time?
questions.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect immediately, and we'll prorate any billing adjustments.

questions.question: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.answer: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and can arrange invoicing for Enterprise customers.

hero.title: LEADERSHIP TEAM
hero.subtitle: We're on a mission to empower creative teams worldwide with intelligent, intuitive production management tools that unlock their full potential.

mission.title: OUR MISSION
mission.content: To democratize professional production management by providing creative teams with enterprise-grade tools that are intuitive, powerful, and accessible to organizations of all sizes.

vision.title: OUR VISION
vision.content: To become the global standard for creative production management, powering the next generation of films, shows, campaigns, and creative projects worldwide.

leadership.title: LEADERSHIP TEAM
leadership.subtitle: Meet the experienced leaders driving innovation and growth at GHXSTSHIP.

awards.title: AWARDS & RECOGNITION

blog.title: Blog | GHXSTSHIP Resources
blog.description: Industry insights, best practices, and behind-the-scenes stories from managing live entertainment productions.

hero.title: INSIGHTS FROM THE TRENCHES
hero.subtitle: Real stories, hard-won lessons, and practical insights from managing everything from cruise ship entertainment to Formula 1 hospitality. No fluff, just what actually works when the pressure's on.

posts.title: What Formula 1 Taught Me About Production Management
posts.excerpt: Managing 1,000+ hospitality staff at a $500M event teaches you things no MBA program ever could. Here's what I learned.
posts.author: Julian Clarkson

posts.title: Surviving Festival Chaos: A Production Manager's Guide
posts.excerpt: From EDC Orlando to Miami Music Week, here's how to keep your sanity when managing 400K+ attendees and everything's on fire.
posts.author: Julian Clarkson

posts.title: How I Reduced Talent Casting from 6 Weeks to 5 Minutes
posts.excerpt: The automation revolution that transformed Carnival Cruise Line's talent acquisition and what it means for the industry.
posts.author: Julian Clarkson

posts.title: Zero Safety Incidents: How We Do It
posts.excerpt: Safety isn't negotiable in live entertainment. Here's our proven framework for maintaining perfect safety records.
posts.author: Julian Clarkson

posts.title: Managing $15M+ Budgets Without Losing Your Mind
posts.excerpt: Real talk about production budgets, cost overruns, and the spreadsheets that haunt your dreams.
posts.author: Julian Clarkson

posts.title: Building Vendor Relationships That Actually Work
posts.excerpt: After 13+ years in the industry, here's what I've learned about working with suppliers, contractors, and everyone in between.
